description:
Kirkpatrick & Goldsborough, PLLC, is a full-service law firm in South Burlington, Vermont. With a team of five attorneys, including partners Mary Kirkpatrick and Richard Goldsborough, our firm provides clients in Burlington and surrounding areas with professional, high-caliber legal counsel in the following areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Criminal defense
  • Divorce and family law
  • Estate planning
  • Business law
  • Professional malpractice
  • Workers' compensation
  • DUI

Personal Injury And Criminal Defense Representation

When our clients are involved in serious accidents and sustain significant injuries, our firm examines the case carefully and identifies every opportunity to pursue compensation. We have represented clients involved in motorcycle accidents, products liability lawsuits and medical malpractice cases in addition to many other personal injury claims.

Our firm handles all aspects of criminal defense representation. This includes educating clients about their rights and responsibilities regarding court appearances, closely examining the nature of charges and identifying pertinent witnesses and defenses. We work collaboratively with clients to develop an aggressive defense strategy.

Divorce, Family Law And Estate Planning Guidance

When a couple has started a family and acquired assets during their marriage, the prospect of divorce generates understandable anxiety. We assist our clients with every aspect of a divorce proceeding including the identification of assets that are likely to be in dispute, assessing child custody needs that are in the best interest of the children and other areas that frequently invite disagreement.

In our estate planning practice, we listen to our clients' long-term legal and financial goals and recommend a personalized set of documents to create a comprehensive estate plan. We also represent clients who are involved in will contests and other estate-related disputes.

Professional Malpractice

Kirkpatrick & Goldsborough represents legal and medical professionals who are facing discipline or other action by relevant licensing boards. We are committed to ensuring that other attorneys, as well as doctors, nurses and other medical professionals, have access to high-quality legal counsel when the need arises.
